title: Becoming Paranormal - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 10/19/21
itunes:title: Becoming Paranormal - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 10/19/21
description:
George Noory and author Michael Goddart discuss his research into death and the value of life, the battle between good and evil in the world, and how spirituality can lead to wisdom which will guide you to a higher state of consciousness.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
